ps3.2:9.20: Ekattagataṃ → ekaggataṃ (s1-3, pts1), nānattakilesehi → nānattakilese (bj, s1-3, pts1)
ps3.2:18.20: rūpiṃ → rūpaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr), sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ → sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
ps3.2:19.7: indavaṇṇaṃ vā →  asuravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṃ vā (sī1, syā1-3)
ps3.2:30.2: cakkavattī → cakkavatti (s1-3, pts1), assabandhagopurise → assabandhagobandhapurise (bj) | assabandhagopake purise (s1-3, pts1)
